title: can riot fu cking fix flex? literally not that hard, ill give u the fucking line of code

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
if player x = plat and player y = silver, dont fucking put them in the same game. how fucking simple is that?

I'm plat 4 and i get paired with 3 silvers and 1 bronze 1 (flex queue ranks). Lol? 

Riot you guys are actually a bunch of monkeys.

replies.body: Theres nothing to fix, it isn't meant to be taken seriously anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=The Big Piece,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2odlp7a3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-03T00:28:01.585+0000)
>
> Theres nothing to fix, it isn't meant to be taken seriously anyway.

o ya i forgot mb
Flex garbage dude. Flex ranks mean absolutely **nothing**
Except rank really has nothing to do with skill or experience, especially after the reset.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2odlp7a3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-03T00:35:11.260+0000)
>
> Except rank really has nothing to do with skill or experience, especially after the reset.

so getting matched with bronze 1 players as a plat in solo/duo is okay? cause apparently that shit doesnt happen for a reason

edit: joke, it happened to iwdominate.
why solo q flex q? you might as well just solo q

> [{quoted}](name=8 4,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2odlp7a3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-03T00:33:50.165+0000)
>
> why solo q flex q? you might as well just solo q

wanted to play a game more casual than ranked and less troll than normals, but I guess riot ended up trolling me anyways
